. It is one of the recently municipalized cities in the country, and is considered one of the best places to visit in the north of Republic of Congo.
On your way to Owando, you will pass a number of cities such as Ngo, Gamboma, Ollombo, Oyo and Obouya, and will cross a number of rivers including Lefini, Mpama, Alima, La vouma, and Le Kouyou.
It has a number of new hotels, and restaurants and boasts one of the best tourist spots in the country (Mambo Beach).
Hotel costs in Owando range from 25,000 CFA (US$50) to 60,000 CFA (US$120) a night depending on the type of hotel.
